html:
I'm still building and codesigning tools for learning at the Design & Partnership Lab at UC Irvine. :)

I'm trying to finish the wedding podcast I promised to make for one of my best friends who just got married! Procrastinating on that by listening to Wind of Change from Crooked Media.

Hey! I've been building data visualization tools for math teachers as part of the Design & Partnership Lab. at UC Irvine (remotely).

I'm having a blast exploring the corners of Charm City by bike while listening to WYPR's Out of the Blocks and Tyler the Creator's IGOR.

Hey! I just graduated from my master's last month and have been teaching CS106B at Stanford with one of my best friends Kylie this summer. Nothing like in person lectures!

I'm listening to Un Verano Sin Ti and the soundtrack to Severance while eating lots of late night L & L spam musubi.
